results.description: England's extraordinary win over New Zealand in the 2019 World Cup final will never be repeated after the boundary countback rule is abolished in ICC events.
results.shortTitle: World Cup drama will never be repeated
results.title: Cricket World Cup final drama never to be repeated after ICC super over change

thumbnail.altText: England celebrate with World Cup trophy

results.description: Australia international Sarah Aley talks us through one of the key weapons in the one-day bowler's armoury - the slower ball.
results.shortTitle: Five steps to the perfect slower ball
results.title: Women's Ashes: Australia seamer Sarah Aley on how to bowl the perfect slower ball

thumbnail.altText: Sarah Aley - five slower ball tips

results.description: England captain Heather Knight reflects on a "manic" month since she lifted the World Cup, seeing herself at Euston and nearly forgetting the trophy.
results.shortTitle: The day I mislaid the World Cup
results.title: Heather Knight column: How I mislaid the World Cup and cooked spag bol for 15 team-mates

results.description: England head coach Mark Robinson is targeting Ashes glory after his side won the Women's World Cup final against India
results.title: Women's World Cup: England head coach Mark Robinson targets Ashes

results.description: The 2013 Women's World Cup barely registered with the public. England's glorious 2017 triumph could not be more different.
results.shortTitle: From forgotten World Cup to front-page news
results.title: England's World Cup win: The transformation of women's cricket

thumbnail.altText: Heather Knight and Katherine Brunt celebrate with England fans

results.description: Watch highlights as England beat India in a tense finale to lift the Women's World Cup at Lord's, with Anya Shrubsole taking 6-46.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Shrubsole inspires England to World Cup glory
results.title: Women's World Cup: England beat India in tense finale to lift World Cup

results.description: Watch the moment England complete a stunning fightback to beat India by nine runs and win the Women's World Cup at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: The moment England won the Women's World Cup
results.title: Women's World Cup: The moment England won thrilling final against India

results.description: Anya Shrubsole takes 6-46 as England win the Women's World Cup thanks to a nine-run win over India in a pulsating final at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: England beat India to win Women's World Cup
results.title: Women's World Cup: England beat India by nine runs in thrilling final at Lord's

results.description: England's Anya Shrubsole trap India's Punam Raut lbw for 86 to set up a tense finale in the Women's World Cup final at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: Shrubsole removes Raut to set up tense finale
results.title: Women's World Cup final: Anya Shrubsole removes Punam Raut for 86 to set up tense finale

thumbnail.altText: Anya Shrubsole celebrates dismissing Punam Raut

results.description: Anya Shrubsole bowls India's Smriti Mandhana in her first over as England make a dream start in defence of 228-7 in the Women's World Cup final at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: Shrubsole bowls Mandhana as England strike early
results.title: Women's World Cup: Anya Shrubsole bowls Smriti Mandhana

thumbnail.altText: Shrubsole bowls Mandhana in second over

results.description: Watch Jhulan Goswami's three wickets as she finishes on 3-23 as India restrict England to 228-7 in the Women's Cricket World Cup final at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: Watch Goswami's three wickets for India against England
results.title: Women's Cricket World Cup: Goswami finishes on figures of 3-23

results.description: India's Jhulan Goswami removes Sarah Taylor and Fran Wilson with successive balls as England post 228-7 in the Women's World Cup final at Lord's.
results.shortTitle: England lose two wickets in two balls
results.title: Women's World Cup final: England's Sarah Taylor and Fran Wilson fall in successive balls

thumbnail.altText: Two wicket in two balls as Taylor and Wilson fall
